casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott Matthew SPIRON. No. 3P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Scott Matthew Spiron, Spruce Pine, for Spiron, Scott Matthew. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2016 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

*620"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
